graph

Class DescendantNodesLabelUpdateTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.DescendantNodesLabelUpdateTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TaskObject

    final class DescendantNodesLabelUpdateTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskObject
    helper auxiliary class for DSPPFinderFwdSrch is not part of the public API. Objects of this class are created by the "master" class DSPPFinderFwdSrch, and they are light-weight enough so as to be possible to be quickly transferred between JVMs in a parallel/distributed version of the forward-search method for the Shortest Path problem.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2017

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

                                      double[] d,
                                      double[] h,
                                      java.util.List ids,
                                      int dest)
        sole constructor.
        Parameters:
        filename - the Graph filename which is needed to load a graph from disk if it's not already loaded
        d - double[] the current labels of the nodes
        h - double[] a valid under-estimate of the node distances from dest
        ids - List // List<Integer> the ids of the node being tested
        dest - int the destination node id
